trans-unit.note: Item appears at top of list of actors and means to show everything for all actors

trans-unit.source: This will permanently delete information about any blocks you have skipped for this project and also clear all skipped styles. Are you sure you want to do this?
Treat paragraph breaks as separate recording blocks (useful for poetry)
trans-unit.target: Trata divisões de parágrafo como blocos de gravação separados (útil para poesia)

trans-unit.source: Treat quotations as separate recording blocks
trans-unit.target: Trata citações como blocos de gravação separados

trans-unit.source: Show book and chapter labels on navigation buttons
trans-unit.target: Exibir rótulos de livro de capítulo nas botões de navegação

trans-unit.source: To use this command, right-click the block slider in the main window.
Additional characters (besides sentence-ending punctuation) to break text into blocks:
trans-unit.target: Caractéres adicionais (além de pontuação de final de frase) para dividir o texto em blocos:

trans-unit.source: Pause punctuation (used when option to break blocks into lines is selected):

Warning: Improper use of the {0} menu command can lead to problems. Do not leave this option enabled for users who do not understand how to use it safely or who do not have an administrative role in the recording project. As a safety measure, this option will be cleared whenever {1} is restarted.
trans-unit.note: Param 0: name of "Shift Clips" menu command; Param 1: HearThis (program name)

trans-unit.source: Select any styles whose text should never be recorded for project {0}.

This project already has recorded clips for some existing blocks. Changing block separation rules means that if you go back and re-record in some chapters, there could be a misalignment. This is because the way HearThis separates text into blocks now won't match how it separated them when the original recordings were made. So you'll just need to check over such chapters and make sure everything is recorded properly.
HearThis will restart to apply the new color scheme.
trans-unit.target: HearThis vai reiniciar para aplicar a nova esquema de cores.

trans-unit.source: Select the modes to make available:
Sorry, {0} does not yet work properly with the Sample project. Please try a real one.
Sorry, your network adapter has no InterNetwork IP address. If you do not know how to resolve this, please seek technical help.
Sync requires your computer to have wireless networking enabled
HearThis is in an unusual state, possibly caused by unplugging a microphone. You will need to restart.

trans-unit.target: Falha ao deletar o arquivo com problema.

trans-unit.source: The file with the existing recording can not be overwritten. We can't record over it at the moment. Please report this error. Restarting HearThis might solve this problem.
{0} currently limits recorded clips to {1} minutes. If you need to record longer clips, please contact support.
trans-unit.note: Param 0: "HearThis" (product name); Param 1: maximum number of minutes
Localize the tooltip, not the button name

trans-unit.source: Next script block (Page Down or Right Arrow key)
trans-unit.note: Localize the tooltip, not the button name
trans-unit.target: Próximo bloco do roteiro (tecla de PgDn ou seta para a direita)

trans-unit.source: This computer appears to have no sound recording device available. You will need one to use this program.

trans-unit.note: Localize the tooltip, not the button name

trans-unit.source: Play the clip for this block (Tab key)
trans-unit.note: Localize the tooltip, not the button name
trans-unit.target: Toca o clipe gravado para este bloco (tecla de tabulação)

trans-unit.source: Hold down the record button (or the space bar) while talking, and only let it go when you're done.
trans-unit.target: Deixe o botão pressionado (ou a barra de espaço) enquanto grava, e somente solta quando terminar.
trans-unit.note: Appears when the button is pressed very briefly

trans-unit.source: Record this block. (Press and hold the mouse or space bar.)
trans-unit.target: Grava este bloco. (Deixa pressionado o botão ou barra de espaço.)

trans-unit.note: Appears as tool tip on the record button when the current block is skipped.

trans-unit.source: That recording has a problem. It will now be removed, if possible.
A backup of the previous recording is available. Would you like to restore it?

trans-unit.note: Displayed as the MessageBox caption when a clip recording exceeds the maximum number of minutes allowed.

trans-unit.source: The record button wasn't down long enough, but that file is locked up, so we can't remove it. Yes, this problem will need to be fixed.
There was a problem accessing Paratext data files.
An error occurred trying to set Paratext projects location to:\n{0}

trans-unit.target: Procuara pasta de projetos de Paratext
trans-unit.note: Displayed in folder browser dialog (only accessible if Paratext is not installed).
Param 0: Paratext project name; Param 1: error details

trans-unit.source: To read this project, a version of {0} compatible with Paratext {1} is required.
The project administrator needs to update it by opening it with Paratext {0} or later. Alternatively, you might be able to revert to an older version of {1}.
This project has a project type ({0}) that is not supported.
Project {0} is not compatible with this version of {1}.
The following Paratext project load errors occurred:

trans-unit.note: Name of second column in Choose Project dialog box, used when the list contains some projects based on text release bundles.
Name of second column in Choose Project dialog box, used when the list contains no projects based on text release bundles.

trans-unit.source: No Paratext projects were found on this computer.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum projeto de Paratext foi achado neste computador.
trans-unit.note: Displayed when Paratext is installed but there are no Paratext projects.

trans-unit.source: No Paratext projects were found in this folder:
trans-unit.target: Nenhum projeto de Paratext foi achado nesta pasta:
trans-unit.note: Displayed when Paratext is not installed and user has chosen a folder that does not contain any Paratext projects.

trans-unit.source: This computer has Paratext 7 installed. To open a Paratext 7 project use a version of HearThis earlier than 1.5.
Paratext does not appear to be installed on this computer.
trans-unit.target: Parece que Paratext não está instalado neste computador.
trans-unit.note: Displayed when no version of Paratext is installed and user has not specified a location where Paratext data can be found.
Displayed when Paratext is not installed and user has chosen a folder that contains one or more Paratext projects.

trans-unit.source: Create new project from text release bundle

trans-unit.target: Procurar pasta de projetos de Paratext

trans-unit.source: Select folder where Paratext projects are located
trans-unit.target: Selecione a pasta onde os projetos de Paratext estão salvos

trans-unit.source: HearThis was unable to delete this clip. File may be locked. Restarting HearThis might solve this problem. File: {0}
Existing folder could not be deleted: {0}
Unexpected recordings (i.e., clips) were encountered in the folder for {0} {1}.
Please wait while {0} migrates the data for {1}. Thank you for your patience!
trans-unit.target: Por favor espere enquanto {0} está migrando os dados para {1}. Obrigado pela paciência!

trans-unit.source: I have taken care of this. Do not show this anymore.
trans-unit.target: Já resolvi isto. Não mostra mais.

trans-unit.source: If after looking at the report you do not know how to fix things yourself, please get help [here].
trans-unit.note: Put square brackets around the text that should appear as the hyperlink. The text in the brackets is localizable. However, note that the URL it will take the user to is in English.

trans-unit.source: During the data migration from version {0}, HearThis encountered some data that it was not able to migrate cleanly.
Create New Project from Text Release Bundle

The {0} project was edited with a newer version of {1}. Its data version ({2}) is not compatible with this version of the program. Please upgrade to the latest version of {1} to open this project or contact technical support if you need to downgrade this project.
trans-unit.note: Param 0: name of project; Param 1: "HearThis" (product name); Param 2: data version of project

trans-unit.source: This version of HearThis is not able to load the selected file ({0}). Please upgrade to the latest version.
This HearThis pack does not have any data for {0}. It contains data for {1}. If you want to merge it please open that project.

trans-unit.source: {0} is complete--click OK to close this window

Não foi possível carregar o projeto: {0}

trans-unit.source: HearThis automatically saves your work, while you use it. This button is just here to tell you that. To create sound files for playing your recordings, on the More menu, click Export Sound Files.

trans-unit.note: {0} will be the file extension, HearThisPack
Keep {0} as a placeholder for the file name
{4} is product name: HearThis; {3} is project name, {0}.{1}.{2} are parts of version number.

trans-unit.source: Merge is complete--click OK to close this window
trans-unit.target: Mesclagem completa -- clique em OK para fechar esta janela

trans-unit.source: Do you want to delete your user settings? (This will clear your most-recently-used project, publishing settings, UI language settings, etc. It will not affect your HearThis project data.)

The following error occurred while preparing an audio session to be able to play back recordings:
{0}
{1} will not work correctly without speakers. Ensure that your speakers are enabled and functioning properly.
Would you like {1} to try again?

trans-unit.note: Cancel Button text changes to this after publishing.

trans-unit.source: This project has first-level quotes broken out into separate blocks, but it looks like the first-level quotation marks may also be used for other levels (nested quotations). If you publish phrase-level labels, Scripture App Builder will need to be configured to include the first-level quotation marks ({0} and {1}) as phrase-ending punctuation, but Scripture App Builder might not be able to distinguish first-level quotes (which should be considered as separate phrases) from other levels (which should not). Are you sure you want to publish phrase-level labels?
trans-unit.note: Param 0 is first-level start quotation mark; Param 1 is first-level ending quotation mark

trans-unit.source: When building the app using Scripture App Builder, make sure that the phrase-ending characters specified on the 'Features - Audio' page include only the sentence-ending punctuation used in your project.

trans-unit.note: Param 0: "Scripture App Builder" (product name); Param 1: "Audacity" (product name)

trans-unit.target: Incluir rótulos para clipes do nível de frase

trans-unit.source: HearThis was unable to copy the combined recording to the correct destination:\n{0}\nPlease report this error. Restarting HearThis might solve this problem.
Start new line at pause punctuation

The settings for this project prevent recording this block because its paragraph style is {0}. If you intend to record blocks having this style, in the Settings dialog box, select the Skipping page, and then clear the selection for this style.
This block has been skipped. If you want to record a clip for this block, first click the Skip button so that it is no longer selected.
All blocks already have recordings or are skipped. You would need to delete a recording to make a "hole" in order to shift existing clips.

There is already a recording for this line.
If you skip it, this recording will be omitted when publishing.

Are you sure you want to do this?
There was a problem updating chapter information for {0}, chapter {1}.
You can divide the line wherever you want. Just record the first part, then the second part. If you want to, you can click in the text to help remember where the second part starts.
Record long lines in parts. (Press P)
trans-unit.target: Grava porções grandes em segmentos. (tecla de p)

trans-unit.note: Shows as an 'X' when on a script line that has been recorded.

trans-unit.source: Skip this block - it does not need to be recorded.
trans-unit.target: Pular este bloco - não precisa ser gravado

trans-unit.note: Only for sample data; Param 0: Book name; Param 1: Chapter number

trans-unit.source: Here if we were using a real project, there would be a sentence for you to read.
A HearThis Pack compresses all your recordings into a single file that can be shared with others working on the same project. Make sure you have the same exact version of the project!

If you are working on a project with parts identified for different voice actors, you can limit the pack to just the current actor. This will make it smaller and also make it even more certain that merging the pack will not overwrite anyone else's work.
Shift recorded clips to the preceding sentence
trans-unit.target: Deslocar clipes gravados para a frase anterior

trans-unit.source: Shift recorded clips to the following sentence
trans-unit.target: Deslocar clipes gravados para a frase seguinte
